attributes.additional_details: As we know welfare reforms are cutting to the bones of the vulnerable disabled and jobless..people and children are suffering and having to visit food banks that are opening at an alarming rate as the people ard finding it hard to feed themselves and family...so as pets are part of the family it seems people are having to make some hard choices ..that means they are having to choose to loose their beloved companions out of poverty...this means already overloaded animal charities will be even more inundated and even they are having to make stark choices...many animals may well also be abandoned at an alarming rate as people are on a constant struggle with financed...so i have created a petition as a voice for the beloved pets that have no voice...please stop more welfare cuts and bedroom tax please as it not only people suffering its animals too thank you
